p: Within functional group (mycorrhizal status), there was variation in strength and direction of each plant species RII response (Fig. 5). Ten mycorrhizal plant species increased in abundance in garlic mustard weeded vs. ambient treatments resulting in a negative RII, whereas four mycorrhizal species had a positive RII. One non‐mycorrhizal plant species had a higher abundance in garlic mustard weeded vs. ambient plots whereas two non‐mycorrhizal species had a positive RII. There was no effect of year or mycorrhizal status on the effect of garlic mustard (RII).
